entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
